title: Taxon
description: A set of organisms asserted to represent a natural cohesive biological unit.

hasDefinedTerm.description: A Defined Term contained in this term set.

parentTaxon.description: Closest parent taxon of the taxon in question.

childTaxon.description: Closest child taxa of the taxon in question.

taxonRank.description: The taxonomic rank of this taxon given preferably as a URI from a controlled vocabulary â€“ typically the ranks from TDWG TaxonRank ontology or equivalent Wikidata URIs.
